entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this morning. Rain at times mixed with snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 40 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Thursday 20 April 2023
